channel.title: netlify on Will Schenk
channel.description: Recent content in netlify on Will Schenk

item.title: Adding a CMS to hugo
item.description: Just because we have a static site doesn’t mean that we can’t have an admin tool to write and edit posts! Lets go through how we can add the NetlifyCMS to the site and host it wherever we want. In my case I’m storing the code on GitHub and also serving the pages from GitHub Pages. Netlify also seems like a really promising company with a number of other services that they offer, so I’d encourage you to check it out.
